description: Defines the Upload entity class representing uploaded files in the backend, including metadata fields like userId, filename, originalFilename, contentType, kind, storagePath, and createdAt. It is annotated for persistence in a MongoDB collection 'uploads'.

classes.name: Upload
classes.description: A data model representing an uploaded file, with metadata such as filename, user ID, content type, type of upload (resume or job), storage path, and timestamp of creation.

methods.name: Upload (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes a new Upload object with specified metadata.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the upload.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the user who uploaded the file.

methods.name: getFilename
methods.description: Returns the filename used for storage.

methods.name: getOriginalFilename
methods.description: Returns the original filename uploaded by the user.

methods.name: getContentType
methods.description: Returns the MIME type of the uploaded file.

methods.name: getKind
methods.description: Returns the type of upload (e.g., resume or job).

methods.name: getStoragePath
methods.description: Returns the storage path where the file is stored.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the upload was created.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier for the upload.

methods.name: setUserId
methods.description: Sets the user ID associated with the upload.

methods.name: setOriginalFilename
methods.description: Sets the original filename provided by the user.

methods.name: setContentType
methods.description: Sets the MIME type of the file.

methods.name: setKind
methods.description: Sets the type of upload (e.g., resume or job).

methods.name: setStoragePath
methods.description: Sets the storage location of the file.
